website_summaries.verdict: Provides a different look and feel compared to other storage bench options. Great for many different locations around the home.
pros: A backless design with raised arms adds some ergonomic comfort when using the bench as an actual piece of furniture
cons: The faux leather can scratch if not handled properly

website_summaries.verdict: Blends with both modern and traditional decor. Great choice if you aren’t overly concerned about storage capacity.
pros: Rounded arms and flared feet give it an added decorative punch
Offers storage room with a hinged lid for easy access
Available in a variety of trendy colors and patterns

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture 🌸
customer_reviews.text: Simply gorgeous! Easy assembly and came wonderfully packaged..(very heavy box by the way) I took a few pics of the measurements height(floor to bottom of bench, floor to seating, complete length(arm to arm) and the storage room depth and also overall depth of the bench..and also how beautiful it looks in my bedroom(already ordered decorative pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. I weigh 500 lbs and it has never had an issue holding me or my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: JadeAshley

customer_reviews.title: Just opening the box and the side piece is missing ...
customer_reviews.text: Just opening the box and the side piece is missing a bottom hem around both legs. The foam is hanging out. The wood is shown darker in the espresso picture but it is VERY light in person and doesn’t match my other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This little seat is not only cute, but it was easy to put together, quickly delivered and the storage is absolutely perfect. I purchased this to use in my dining room. I have an extremely small house and every piece of furniture has to do double duty. This little seat not only provides room for someone (or two tiny people) to sit, but it also houses all of my table linens. The fabric is great, and piece is sturdy and I am SO happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The bench is nice looking, not super sturdy, but we bought it more for looks than for function - so it will work for us. Everything was packaged very well. However, protective bubble wrap had been wrapped right around 3 of the 4 damaged legs. We’ll live with it to avoid the hassle of return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Watson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in entry
customer_reviews.text: Looks perfect in my entryway! Feels very sturdy. Easy to assemble. I hadn’t noticed that the tufting doesn’t have buttons, which is a little strange but ok. The seat compartment is a little hard to open and close once the sides are tightly bolted on. The box arrived with a pretty big smashed in section, but luckily there wasn’t any damage to the bench. The legs were wrapped in bubble wrap, but both front legs had minor flaws out of the box (a scratch and a drip of the clear finish). The leatherette looks great. Overall, it’s just what I was looking for and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Yodel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and put together it's AMAZING. I was so nervous because it was so much cheaper than the other ones I found online but I'm so glad I went for it! Gorgeous color, beautiful design nice storage and size!!!!! Looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Primer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Well Made Bench!
customer_reviews.text: The soft beige storage bench is simply beautiful & elegant! Very well made. Easy to put together, just screw in the sidearms in pre-drilled holes as the solid wood legs are already in uh place. Fabric is nice & strong, seating is firm (est.3/4"-1" foam & batting). Not for long term sitting due to firmness of seating but great for putting on shoes or getting dressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected it. It doesn't look cheap and it's comfortable. Match my furniture really well. I put ot together by myself although it took me a min to get the screw in the hole on the arms. It still was fairly easy to put together. Also if you have hardwood floors it will slide. I have a rug coming so I'm not complaining but if you don't you might need to put something under the legs because the bench is not that heavy and is easy to slide. The storage space is a plus. I am very happy witb this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric
customer_reviews.text: The storage bench is what we expected. Stuffing around the legs was sticking out. Obviously it was made in a hurry. We pushed stuffing back up inside and it looks fine now. It's a sturdy bench, nice beige fabric. The legs/arms were a little difficult to put together but once we lined up the screw holes it went together. Overall good quality bench.
customer_reviews.author: BABs

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable for brief periods and it looks great at the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted for my master bedroom. It's comfortable for brief periods and it looks great at the foot of our bed. I sprayed it with Scotchgard as soon as I had it together to protect the material from my dogs. It was easy to assemble but the padding material did wrap around the bolts a little and I had to cut away some padding so I could get the bolt to go in all the way.
customer_reviews.author: TennesseeSig

customer_reviews.title: Functional and cute, but
customer_reviews.text: It was so cute and functional, but not great quality. The legs came dented and scratched. There was a piece of string sewn into the bench. The company said too much damage sms wouldn't send parts. I was referred to Amazon so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E Brace

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this! I wish my dogs didn’t think it was a new bed and chew toy for them though. Once we’re out of puppy phase I will buy this bench again! Not deep storage but enough for some throw blankets or sweaters! Great bench and super easy assembly!
customer_reviews.author: Alex South

customer_reviews.title: Beige vs. Tan
customer_reviews.text: For those that couldn’t see a difference between the Beige and Tan - here it is! I bought both to compare. The tan is the darker of the 2. The beige fabric is softer, but the tan has more flecks to hide dirt better. I went with the tan to have more contrast. Sturdy benches!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional Bench
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bench along with a mirror to updated older ones we had in place in the ladies room of our law firm's bathroom. The bench is very stylish and has a functional storage area under the seat where some of our staff keep their feminine products for discrete, ease of access, when needed in the ladies room.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn K.

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Overall ok for the price, but you get what you pay for. Wasn't terribly difficult to assemble, but the hinges were twisted for the lid and the screws had popped out of the plywood and didn't have enough friction to go back in a second time. The fake leather looks really fake in brown. I recommend a different color. Wish I bought it in black instead.
customer_reviews.author: ClothesHorse

customer_reviews.title: Hard and uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the bench for my daughter room for her birthday. I wasn’t home when the bench came to our home. My husband decided to put the bench together for her. He didn’t realized the bench had a snag on the cushion of the seat. The bench was very hard when you seat on it. I didn’t send it back because my daughter was excited and my husband threw the boxes away. Also he didn’t want to take it apart. The shipping was also late
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, sturdy, and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this ottoman. We were looking for an ottoman to place at the foot of our bed, and ordered this piece because of the storage capacity and simplistic style. We put it together in about 15 minutes (we had to use some of our own tools to tighten the screws) and were happy to see that the ottoman is exactly as its pictured. It's more on the sturdy side than soft, which we prefer, and is pretty lightweight. It matches well with the rest of our bedroom furniture. Our pets have taken a liking to it as well, which is an added bonus because now we have extra room in the bed at night. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cat S.

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly great. I always expect items like this to be shoddy, but this is a great piece of furniture. It's sturdy, comfortable, looks great, and the hinge for the storage is tight so the bench won't slam on your hands when opening or closing it. This bench is so quality that my friend who helped me put it together (it's quick and easy to do but helps to have an extra set of hands) is buying one for herself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so the quality is really low. The materials used are ok, but the craftsmanship is... Well it is crap. I'd be embarrassed to put my name on it. I have unwrapped it, but am totally debating sending it back,even though I'm lazy and would usually keep something like this, I think this time, it's just too much. The blue is more of a cornflower than a navy, but that's beside the point. Update : my husband who doesn't much care about cosmetic flaws said return. He said one of the legs looked like it was going to break off. Picture included
customer_reviews.author: Diana Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Bench!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking bench not only nice looking buy bery sturdy an strong and easy to assemble the only thing I had to do was use the eight screws that vame with it to attach the two side pieces which serves as the arm and legs for this bench
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: This is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a foot of the bed storage bench and this fits great in my bedroom. It is nice slick looking, easy to install, comfortable and ample storage room for throw pillows or extra sheets. The espresso color is also very good becasue it blends nicely with most any bedroom furniture set.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and is very sturdy. Comfortable with good padding on seat. Would buy again. Storage enough for a twin size blanket. blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Freelyforgiven1

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my bedroom. The color is a deep chocolate and it's very sturdy and holds the extra blanket perfectly. The only down issue was assembly which wasn't that bad but could have been better. Only took 20 minutes to put together once I figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: devin adams

customer_reviews.title: unsatisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: bought this item and when it came I was not satisfied with the product, the seat seemed very hard and the fabric was not to my expectation. I wanted to return the item but their customer service made it very difficult for me to return it. they want to deduct 20% for re stocking and also want us to ship on our own expense. HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE, BE CAREFUL.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: So easy and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I never bother to leave reviews but I am so incredibly pleased with this bench. It came right on time and was the easiest thing ever to put together. It was three pieces and you didn't need any tools, it was all included. My 13yo daughter and I put it together in @ 15 minutes. It looks beautiful, stores some items and looks much more expensive than it was. Could not be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: TCB

customer_reviews.title: Cute, not as sturdy as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and cute- but not sturdy. It couldn't handle being used at the foot of my bed for my dog to sleep on (she's about 75 lbs); the side arm has cracked and the fabric is ripping. The damage to the fabric is obviously because of the dog scratching (to be expected), but I was not expecting the broken arm piece.
customer_reviews.author: PandaBear

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is absolutely gorgeous! I love it. Purchased the brown one. It only takes 4 screws on each side. It is helpful if you have a helper but it can be done alone. I placed mine at the foot of my queen sized bed and it fits perfectly. Two people can sit on the bench. Love it and it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: I like this but it’s not well made. Three random screws fell out during assembly. No clue from where. It was missing the leg pads for two of the legs. It looks nice but don’t think it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing except for the error on the manufactures part
customer_reviews.text: Honestly for the price it’s really good sturdy enough does the job really nice looking and looks pretty sleek. The only problem I have is the chair, on the left-hand side, where the front legs get screwed on the holes were not punctured in the fabric so I had to puncture it myself I could’ve sent it back but I knew I could do it a so I just save myself some time however I shouldn’t of had to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Abbys music

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This is actually amazing. I would recommend getting this leather than the cloth material bc overtime it tends to get a frizz like some cloths do which definitely doesn't look pleasing when guests are over.
customer_reviews.author: Tamanna

customer_reviews.title: Unfinished and broken hinges
customer_reviews.text: The product is pretty, but the hinges were broken upon arrival and the item was missing pre-drilled holes so I cannot attach the lid. I would not recommend this product, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived professionally wrapped and fast. Only uses 8 screws, washers and an alien wrench(comes with it) Look is great very sturdy took me 20 minutes to unbox and put together. Very happy with the purchase . There are a couple areas around the legs that I need to remove some glue but no big deal and I probably only noticed it cause it was putting it together. Seems very sturdy when sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: kerystal

customer_reviews.title: Stylish entrance hall seat
customer_reviews.text: I have it by the entrance doors and it looks very elegant. It came well packed and was easy to assemble. If you’re looking for a stylish casual seat particularly in a hallway then I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: acko sangha, London

customer_reviews.title: The fabric looks like linen and matches my headboard so of course I ...
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to put the legs on by myself so I had to get help.The fabric looks like linen and matches my headboard so of course I like it !
customer_reviews.author: Terri's stuff

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this! The fabric is nice and a little textured, which adds a slightly richer feel to it. It feels fairly sturdy to me, and the storage (even though it’s not super deep, it’s sufficient!) is a great touch. I just got it today so can’t speak to it’s longevity, but so far I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Missa8182

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: When you open or close the storage hinges are too weak, and the screws that hold it together too small therefore coming completely off. We had to return it not worthy the trouble we went through to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice but the legs are much lighter than the picture shows.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench and it was just what I was looking for. However, the legs are a much lighter finish than the picture shows. I am going to stain them to match the other furniture in my bedroom. Otherwise, it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Scharff

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and is comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This bench was everything I prayed for. Came packaged well. I had no problem assembling it. Id buy it again. Im very pleased. The storage space is as expected bc of its size.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Elainna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, looks beautiful in our master bedroom at the foot of our bed as pictured!
customer_reviews.author: Jokris10

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and functional
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bench. Sturdy and functional. I use it in the living room to keep tv remote controls and a throw blanket in. Feels very rock solid when I sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Dean

customer_reviews.title: This took a minute to put together but was worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. Got it for the end of my bed to store bedding and also to help my doggo up on the bed. It’s the perfect size for my queen bed, just a bit smaller than the width and it works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Item is well made. Easy to put together. It is used for astetics and storage. Bought from Amazon Warehouse Deals. Would not of paid full price.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive than it actually is
customer_reviews.text: Looks a lot fancier than I expected. A slight wobble, but it might be loose screws. Got it so my dog could look out the window so wasn't expecting much, but it's really nice. The fabric is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Heaton

customer_reviews.title: Love at first (second, third) sight
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bench. It is easy to install the feet, it's very sturdy and offers comfortable seating - not too firm. I actually love it so much, I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Mme Grroschat

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. Very sturdy bench which adds the perfect touch to my master bedroom. This is an excellent storage bench and I was able to assemble in ten minutes. Great price as well. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Good product and value!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in good condition, no dents or tears in the fabric. Very easy to assemble and sturdy. Color was spot on. My husband and I can both sit on it comfortably. We purchased it for our bedroom as an end of the bed bench and it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Whitten

customer_reviews.title: The bench is sturdy and nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bench. The arms are sturdy and high enough to lean against. The beige color is neutral and goes well with the room. The storage area holds more than I expected. I highly recommend this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this storage bench to hold sheets and as a seat. 7 year old son easily managed to break a leg on bench as the curved design makes them less sturdy and impossible to repair. There are others less expensive and kid friendly. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C.O.

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little bench at the foot of the bed. It's not fancy but it appears to be well made and put together neatly.
customer_reviews.author: A. P. Sisson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We returned but because of space not product. Product was very good. Very stable. We really liked it. Just didn’t work with space. Would buy again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Lisby

customer_reviews.title: Works so well in my office.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best office furniture purchases thus far! I put it together in about 10 minutes. It's quite sturdy and doesn't take up much room in my small space, yet it has storage in side which is a great help. So glad I found this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great investment. I use this for my photoshoots. So glad I chose this one. Not heavy so I can lift by myself but yet sturdy enough for two adults to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: falixity

customer_reviews.title: Love this ottoman/bench
customer_reviews.text: Not as much storage as many others however it is very sturdy and works well as a bench, so good trade-off
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy.  The picture and product match up. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to assemble. Seems like good quality. Durability will need to be assessed.
customer_reviews.author: Saab nj

customer_reviews.title: Soft and beautiful, good for end of bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bench to put at the end of my king sized bed and I am very happy with it. The bench was easy to put together, has a soft cover, and looks great. Good price as well
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my studio - use it for photo shoots - it is not exceptionally sturdy - but it is great for what I use it for!
customer_reviews.author: R. Baggaley

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bench
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price. It shipped right away and it was very easy to put together!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wonderwan

customer_reviews.title: Great value - Quality Beautiful Piece
customer_reviews.text: This bench is very nice. I put it together in about 15 minutes, and I have no handy skills. It's very dark brown. The material is very nice and it looks so beautiful. This is an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Accurate description and perfect bench for entryway
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great find after searching hours on many sites for a perfect bench. This is easy to assembly and made of quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Holly S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I used this ottoman for the end of my bed. It matched perfectly with my headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Eason Raney

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Beautiful color, construction. Hubby and I are able to sit on it. It looks beautiful at the foot of our King size bed. A welcome addition to our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. It took my husband 15 minutes to put together not complicate at all. Great accent to any room. Very beautiful piece and for the price even better.
customer_reviews.author: M ramos

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive good looking seating.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Added pillows and have inexpensive extra seating for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Happy custimer.
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute! Arrived yesterday and the hubs assembled it in no time. I’m a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: IT IS WHAT WE EXPECTED.  NO ISSUES.
customer_reviews.text: The ottoman arrived in good condition and early. It is fine. The color was as shown and it performs as expected.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and weak
customer_reviews.text: This product is poorly manufactured. The arms on the bench are extremely flimsy and can’t be leaned on whatsoever or they will brake. We will be sending this product back because it is not worth over 100$. We are extremely disappointed. We bought the tan bench not the leather look alike.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Not brand new
customer_reviews.text: It looks like some one returned it and the shipped to me. The toolkit is opening and the bottom is grinded away.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Ren

customer_reviews.title: I love this bunch it's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this bunch it's beautiful. Love the fact that it has a storage compartment. Looks pretty and functional...2 good qualities.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: She likes it. Didn't want to return it. Must be fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Durham

customer_reviews.title: Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: Great color, but the assembly wasn't great. The holes don't line up perfectly, therefore, the bench is not sturdy because I couldn't screw in all screws tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. Beautiful fabric and looks wonderful at the end of our king bed. Would absolutely recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my bedroom in front of my king bed
customer_reviews.author: LinLin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent storage bench.
customer_reviews.text: I like the height of the legs and storage space of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer waiting for order.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek useful storage and seat.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the bedroom for storing blanket or remotes for the TV. Nice looking without being the center of attention.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a very nice piece. I was concerned about this item but turned out great. It was easy for me to assemble. Really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Ordered Monday. Arrived Wednesday. Just before V-Day. A gift for my man. Easy to put together & comes with all the parts. Perfect size. Great for any room!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal J

customer_reviews.title: Color not as pictured or described.
customer_reviews.text: Foam sticking out of the leg, I was shipped the wrong color. There’s no support on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Easy Assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to assemble. Comes in a big rectangular box. A little hard to sat on, but does the work. Got it in soft beige. Pillow in the picture is from Amazon too.
customer_reviews.author: WR

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the entryway and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the entryway and very sturdy. My husband is 220 lbs and no problems when he sits on it. It holds about 6 pairs of shoes, depending on the size.
customer_reviews.author: THN

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: High end with low cost! Assembled in 10 minutes. Looks great. Dark brown leather with expresso color wood. Perfect for the end of our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Renee  T

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This storage bench is a great accessory for a bedroom. I found it to be sturdy and has a great design. Assembly was fairly easy, as long as everything is lined up properly. Completely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Swygert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks great for the price. Only gave 4 starts because I wish the storage space was a little deeper. Love using it to organize and store my sheets and pillowcases
customer_reviews.author: Monique Mackay

customer_reviews.title: This is not navy, to me it is blue ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not navy, to me it is blue. I kept it but not totally thrilled with the color. Stores 3 throw pillows inside. This is more for decoration, few people will sit on it. So far it is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Yo Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great looking piece for a low cost!
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice! I have the espresso faux leather one and it looks like a high end piece. The bench is very sturdy and the extra storage inside is very handy. One down side is that the seat cover seemed to get stuck when closing the storage. This might be due to the weather and the material expanding. Other than that it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Alex C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute in my guest bedroom. Pillows add the finishing touch
customer_reviews.author: angela scott

customer_reviews.title: It looks great with the blue and gray area rug
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this storage bench to go under my staircase in the dining room. It looks great with the blue and gray area rug. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Great size and overall look, but super cheaply made. The material already has a tear in it and the fasteners bent easy.
customer_reviews.author: leah mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. It is well made and looks like a high quality piece. The color is very nice and match my room décor very well. The seating is comfortable and the storage is efficient enough to store a few throw blankets. If you are thinking about it, DO IT! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Munson

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice at the foot of my bed and a perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. It looks nice at the foot of my bed and a perfect fit. I can store extra throw pillows in it. I also loved the color, a deep brown. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid bench. Using in foyer as a seat to take shoes on/off. The color I got is a more pink-toned beige. Wished it was more grey toned or putty, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: kosmo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Have had it that long but the color is nice and so far, it is holding up! I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Essie Sumpter-Young

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Good price. Customer service not good
customer_reviews.text: The leg has a crack. The customer service did not get back to me.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and space saving.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Small enough to fit comfortably at the end of my bed without being overwhelming. Ample storage and beautiful fabric. Easy to assemble. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Honor

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: this bench is exactly what we wanted! It is currently holding our bluRay collection, so its funtional & beautiful. It was easy to assemble & came in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great little bench! This bench is good looking and is very well made. It can easily support two adults.
customer_reviews.author: John Rokas

customer_reviews.title: Bed bench.
customer_reviews.text: I like this bench. It fits just exactly at the end of our full bed. Good storage. Our room is clutter free now. Nice to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Zeny Rose

customer_reviews.title: Recommend highly.....
customer_reviews.text: A winner! Beautiful linen fabric and well-made. I put it together myself in about half an hour, all hardware and Allen wrench included, with written directions that were easy to follow. I have the bench in my entryway and it looks great. And the price is sure right!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: Such a great price. It looks really well made. We’ve had it for a few months and it’s still sturdy and looks great in our bedroom at the foot of our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was within the dates they stated. Seems to be sturdy and just as the pic. Looks good and comes packaged very well!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Sellman

product_meta.title: Convenience Concepts Designs4Comfort Garbo Storage Bench, Espresso
product_meta.description: Color:EspressoComplete any room in your home with the Designs4Comfort Garbo Storage Bench by Convenience Concepts. Whether you want to take a seat or store a few things, this ottoman doubles as a comfortable bench and a stylish storage unit. Tuck away blankets, pillows and more under the hinged top which allows for easy access to plenty of storage space. This bench is crafted from solid poplar wood, flame resistant foam, and upholstered in faux leather. Whether the Garbo is used as a bench or a storage unit, this product is sure to tie any space together in timeless style.
feature_bullets: Doubles as a Bench and Storage Unit
